email_text:
Subject: Urgent: Temporary Account Suspension Notification

Dear Valued Customer,

We regret to inform you that your Bank of America account is at risk of being temporarily suspended due to suspicious activity detected on your account. Our security systems have identified several unauthorized login attempts and unusual transactions, which may indicate that your account has been compromised.

To prevent any further unauthorized access and protect your funds, we have initiated a temporary suspension on your account. In order to lift this suspension and secure your account, we kindly ask you to verify your account information by clicking on the link below:

[Phishing link]

Please note that failure to verify your account information within the next 24 hours may result in permanent account suspension and potential loss of funds. We take the security of our customers very seriously and urge you to act promptly to resolve this issue.

Thank you for your cooperation in this matter. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your immediate attention to this urgent matter.

Sincerely,
Bank of America Security Team
